en.content: You awaken to the sound of feet in the street outside. Your night’s rest has brought a new determination. Today, you will meet Emberhead on your own terms.

text.content: You may restore 1 hit point if you have been wounded.

zh.content: 你被房外街道上的脚步声吵醒了。一晚上的休息为你带来了新的目标。今天，你要凭借自己的努力面对烬头村。

text.content: 如果你受过伤，你可以回复1点耐久值。
